Description_lang: You have gleaned a rudimentary skill in mirror repair by watching Laurent. Perhaps further reflection can open new doors.

name_blz.en_US: The Lost of Art of Mirrors
name_blz.es_MX: El arte perdido de los espejos
name_blz.en_GB: The Lost of Art of Mirrors
name_blz.es_ES: El arte perdido de los espejos

description_blz.en_US: You have gleaned a rudimentary skill in mirror repair by watching Laurent. Perhaps further reflection can open new doors.
description_blz.es_MX: Adquiriste habilidades rudimentarias para reparar espejos mirando a Laurent. La reflexión siempre abre nuevas puertas.
description_blz.pt_BR: Você ganhou uma habilidade básica em reparo de espelhos observando Laurent. Talvez refletir mais abra novas portas.
description_blz.de_DE: Ihr habt durch die Beobachtung von Laurent einige Grundkenntnisse der Spiegelreparatur erlangt. Vielleicht wird weitere Reflexion neue Türen öffnen.
description_blz.en_GB: You have gleaned a rudimentary skill in mirror repair by watching Laurent. Perhaps further reflection can open new doors.
description_blz.es_ES: Has adquirido cierta habilidad rudimentaria en la reparación de espejos al observar a Laurent. Quizás con más reflexión se puedan abrir nuevas puertas.
description_blz.fr_FR: Vous avez acquis les rudiments de la réparation de miroirs en observant Laurent. Approfondir vos connaissances vous ouvrira peut-être de nouvelles portes.
description_blz.it_IT: Guardare Laurent ha fornito una certa abilità rudimentale nella riparazione degli specchi. Forse ulteriori riflessioni possono aprire nuove porte.
description_blz.ru_RU: Наблюдая за тем, как Лоран чинит зеркала, вы кое-чему научились. Вероятно, если вы еще над этим подумаете, для вас откроются новые двери.
description_blz.ko_KR: 로렌트를 어깨 너머로 지켜보면서 거울 수리의 기초를 터득했습니다. 심화적인 고찰을 해보면 새로운 가능성이 열릴지도 모릅니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 透過觀察勞倫特，你學到了修復鏡子的基本技巧。也許繼續觀摩能讓你掌握更多竅門。
description_blz.zh_CN: 你已经通过观察劳伦特学会了修复镜子的基本技能。也许再反思一下可以打开新的大门。
